title: Stop extension shortcut from resetting upon reloading
content:
There's an add-on that I often need to change one of its settings. Luckily I can assign an extension shortcut to it and it works great. However every-time I reload Firefox, that extension shortcut is reset so I need to assign it again. How do I stop that?

I'd prefer if the issue was dealt generally, but if specifics are needed it's about Stylus 1.5.30 on Firefox 111.0.1.

Thank you kindly for your assistance
creator: DynV

title: I think I've had enough of FF. I thyink my default browser is going to be EDGE
content: Can't get an answer to which PC the others are syncing from, problems with font size, problems with the header URL section, bookmark bar, and too many UPDATES. I just updated to 111.o and now there's another one.
creator: gmajic
